text: Nɨ mangɨ Pisgan Mɨghsɨam bar an ghuamɨn ghuavanabogh, vongɨn notɨn amadaghan ganɨva, saut amadaghan ganɨva, aruem anadi naghɨn ganɨva, aruem ghuaghiri naghɨn gan. Nɨ Jordanɨn Fanem abigh vongɨn mangɨgh nguazir kamɨn mangɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ deraghvɨra danganir kabar gan.
